nodes.text: The Omega Flight Group, also known as Omega Group, was a TIE line starfighter flight group within the service of the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. Under the Imperial Starfighter Corps, Omega Group was led by "Omega Leader," and consisted of at least fifteen other members with numbered callsigns.

Omega Flight Group, also referred to as Omega Group for short, was a starfighter flight group within the Imperial Starfighter Corps of the Galactic Empire. As a flight group, it was led by "Omega Leader" and consisted of at least fifteen other members who used numbered callsigns including Omega Two, Omega Three, Omega Four, Omega Five, Omega Six, Omega Seven, Omega Eight, Omega Nine, Omega Ten, Omega Eleven, Omega Twelve, Omega Thirteen, Omega Fourteen, Omega Fifteen, and Omega Sixteen. The unit utilized TIE line starfighters while in service.
Omega Flight Group participated in the Galactic Civil War against the Rebel Alliance, and was part of the Imperial forces on Jakku towards the end of the war.
Omega Flight Group made its first appearance in the 2015 video game Star Wars Battlefront, which was published by Electronic Arts.
